messages.messageBody:
Bring out the sake! ^____^

Just wanted to wish everybody a Happy All Hallows Eve! It's pretty early, I know, but knowing me? I'd forget XD

Here's a little treat:

http://kaneyoshi.livejournal.com/44516.html

Enjoy~


~Kane
